text: Persian Romani, also known as Ghorbati/Qorbati (قوربتی), is a Persian and Romani mixed language spoken in Khorasan (Iran, Afghanistan, and Pakistan) as well as Central Asia (Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, and Kyrgyzstan). It has mostly Persian vocabulary with a few additional native Romani words. == References == Category:Languages of Iran Category:Languages of Pakistan Category:Languages of Afghanistan Category:Roma
title: Persian Romani
